DOC.brief_summary: This is a study prospectively enrolling adolescent idiopathic scoliosis (AIS) patients and try to find how the age will impact the surgical outcome of AIS.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Age on Surgical Outcome of Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis
DOC.criteria: Adolescent idiopathic scoliosis patients; undergoing posterior correction surgery; with minimum 5 years followup; with fullspine radiography. with spinal tumor; with hip disease; without quality of life measurements.
